column5: I delivered the aquarium to the Walkerton Sacred Heart High School last Friday & set everything up in one of the Science Classes then I delivered the Salmon yesterday at 2:45, the staff & Students that I bumped into were impressed with the set up. Check out the Blog. http://lhfcschoolhat...s.blogspot.com/ Thanx & Tight Lines Richard
Awesome stuff Richard, you creating ageneration of anglers there   Very worthwhile - keep up the good work.
